summary: This is a confidential email from an executive assistant, dated August 10, 2019, forwarding a phone log related to Jeffrey Epstein. The sender requests the recipient to ensure the log is forwarded to the FBI and the Office of the Inspector General (OIG).

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The document is a forwarded phone log concerning Jeffrey Epstein, indicating he is the central subject of the communication.

events.title: Forwarding of Epstein Phone Log
events.description: An executive assistant sends a confidential email containing a phone log related to Jeffrey Epstein, with instructions to forward it to the FBI and OIG.

keyFacts: A phone log related to Jeffrey Epstein was forwarded via email on August 10, 2019.
The sender explicitly requested the log be forwarded to the FBI and the Office of the Inspector General (OIG).
The document is marked as confidential and is part of the SDNY (Southern District of New York) case files.
